service.name: colorgrade
service.info: this service provide tasks for colorgrade analytics

task.name: berrycolor_workflow
task.info: task for direct interpolation of high and low density colorgrade data

input.name: average_point_distance
input.info: this number is use to decide how to rasterize the rows and the search radius when for the inverse distance is applied

input.name: area_multiplier
input.info: used to increase the interpolation grid resolution, use 2 to halve the pixel size

service.name: database
service.info: this service provide tasks data upload and database management

input.name: fields
input.info: mapping between the data fields and the required fields

task.name: upload
task.info: Upload data file to a server folder and add a row to the metadata table. Data files are for yield, soil, canopy, sensor

input.name: file
input.info: a .csv or a .zip file. Zip file should contain the three mandatory files defining a shapefile: 'shp', 'shx', 'dbf'

input.name: datetime
input.info: date and time in timestamp format e.g. (2017-08-15 14:19:25.63)

input.name: roworientation
input.info: Main orientation of the vineyard rows

task.name: getfields
task.info: get the fields of the uploaded data

input.name: fileformat
input.info: format for the file e.g csv, zip for shapefiles

task.name: todatabase
task.info: map file names and upload file to database tables;  fill in the valuemap in the metadata table

input.name: filename
input.info: filename, for shapefiles the suffix is .zip

input.name: datasetid
input.info: the unique dataset id returned by the upload service

input.name: folderid
input.info: the unique folder id returned by the upload service

task.name: getjson
task.info: gey a point layer in geojson format, by default get all the value fields, otherwise specify which field

input.name: datasetid
input.info: the unique dataset id returned by the upload service

input.name: values
input.info: comma separated values to get, e.g. value1,value2

input.name: limit
input.info: the max number of features returned by the query

task.name: getvmap
task.info: get a point layer in geojson format

input.name: datasetid
input.info: the unique dataset id returned by the upload service

task.name: uploadids
task.info: upload ids in order to select data for further processing, e.g. geo

input.name: datasetid
input.info: the unique dataset id returned by the upload service

input.name: folderid
input.info: the unique folder id, if false a new id will be created

input.name: exclude
input.info: pass any value to treat the ids as excluded values instead of included

service.name: multicriteria
service.info: this service provide tasks for multicriteria analysis

service.name: geometry
service.info: this service provide tasks for geometry operations, both spatial and aspatial

service.name: charting
service.info: this service provide tasks for generating charts

service.name: synch_asynch_tests
service.info: this service provide synchronous and asynchronous tests
